6b5a73eb-a9ac-49b6-a9e8-cebba1725554.description: Human AI isn’t a dystopian future – it’s the way people collaborate with machines to increase business productivity and create new value. In this cutting-edge course, you will learn how to blend the leadership, creativity and social skills of humans with the speed, scalability and quantitative capabilities of AI. It’s a recipe for building better teams, contributing to your company’s bottom line – and future-proofing your career.
6b5a73eb-a9ac-49b6-a9e8-cebba1725554.name: The Future of Leadership: Human and AI Collaboration in the Workforce

5edfb2c9-7974-450a-bc67-6681eb888bc3.description: Drawing on the expertise of Oxford faculty and industry leaders, the Oxford Blockchain Strategy Programme provides an understanding of this transformative technology, covering cryptocurrencies and various types of blockchain protocols and networks. Participants will explore what a blockchain is, how it works, and its applications - from digital assets to intergalactic communications - and learn frameworks and methodologies to develop and deploy business models built around this new technology.
5edfb2c9-7974-450a-bc67-6681eb888bc3.name: Oxford Blockchain Strategy Programme

832f34a4-cf37-46c8-9d92-44ea550e2d65.description: This six-week online programme is designed to help startup founders, CEOs and heads of corporate new venture groups overcome the barriers of accessing expertise, networks, time and methodologies to create a new artificial intelligence (AI) startup, or to transform an existing venture. 771c0557-6870-468c-bfaa-0369c90382fc.description: The University of Cambridge's Startup Funding: Pre-Seed to Exit six week online programme goes beyond what first-time entrepreneurs and seasoned founders leading high-growth companies must understand when raising capital – especially at a venture’s earliest funding stages (seed to Series B). The programme will cover exactly how to fund a venture and navigate critical inflection points along a company's growth trajectory to achieve either a successful exit, or long-term operational viability.

e595ae98-6fdd-4e3c-8d55-d9d8887180f9.description: Today’s innovators and entrepreneurs have a unique opportunity to tackle the climate crisis by creating business sustainability initiatives.
